item.title: Knee Osteoarthritis treated by vitamin D if use more than 2,000 IU daily or non-daily high dose â€“ meta-analysis
item.description:
Relationship between 25-hydroxy vitamin D and knee osteoarthritis: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials

Front Med (Lausanne) . 2023 Aug 2;10:1200592. doi: 10.3389/fmed.2023.1200592

Rui Wang # 1 2, Zheng-Ming Wang # 3, Si-Cheng Xiang 4, Zhao-Kai Jin 4, Jing-Jing Zhang 4, Ji-Cheng Zeng 4, Pei-Jian Tong 5, Shuai-Jie Lv 5

Objective: In order to examine the relationship between 25-hydroxyl vitamin D and knee osteoarthritis (KOA), a meta-analysis of 8 randomized controlled trials (RCTs) publications was hereby performed.
